page.title: 03HOUSING IN TARBERT,HARRIS
page.content: There are many different types of houses in the Tarbert area.The first comparison we made was between council and private housing,here 54% of the houses are private houses and 46% are council owned.This however does not a true picture since there is a higher propotion of council houses in Tarbert than anywhere else in Harris. The next thing we looked at was the style of houses,2.7% are flats,17.6% are croft houses,31.7% are detached and 42.6% are not detached. The size of the houses range from ones with one bedroom to houses with more than six bedrooms,the most common size of house however is a three bedroomed one,more than half of the houses in our area are of that size.
